WAMILIMO UTALI Hotel

Mombasa

About Us

Discover a haven of hospitality at

Wamilimo Utali Hotel,

every moment is tailored to elevate your experience. Nestled in the heart of

Mombasa

, our hotel offers a perfect blend of luxury and comfort, inviting you to unwind in style. Indulge your palate with our tantalizing array of specially crafted dishes and signature drinks, meticulously prepared by our talented chefs. Whether you're craving local flavors or international delights, our restaurant promises a culinary journey like no other.



Experience relaxation redefined in our thoughtfully designed accommodations, where modern amenities and personalized service await your arrival. From cozy rooms to spacious suites, each space exudes warmth and charm, promising a restful retreat after a day of exploration. Additionally, our versatile conference hall provides the ideal backdrop for productive meetings, memorable celebrations, and everything in between. At Wamilimo Utali Hotel, we're dedicated to creating unforgettable moments for every guest, ensuring your stay exceeds expectations from start to finish. Come, discover the essence of hospitality with us.
